TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class TextBox Inherits TextControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type TextBox = class inherit TextControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供使用户可以输入文本的基于文本的控件。

span.span: Provides a text-based control that allows the user to enter text.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只允许单行文本输入。The allows only single-line text input. 此控件还实现 接口;它可以接受输入并生成回发。This control also implements the interface; it can accept input and generate postbacks. 但对于使用 WML 的设备，输入的数据可能不会回发到服务器。With devices using WML, however, entered data might not post back to the server. 当用户在文本框中输入值时，这些值将存储在从 基类继承的 属性中。When the user enters values in a text box, the values are stored in the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。A accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Mobile Web Forms pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Introduction to the TextBox Control

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先尝试对 引用的 对象调用 方法。The method first attempts to call the method on the object referenced by . 如果适配器没有用于将 post 数据加载到控件中的特定于设备的实现，该调用将返回 `false`，然后 方法将根据 测试指定 `key` 上 `data` 参数引用的对象的值。If the adapter has no device-specific implementation for loading the post data into the control, that call returns `false` and the method then tests the value of the object referenced by the `data` parameter at the specified `key` against . 如果值不相等，则设置新值。If the values are not equal, the new value is set. 如果尝试加载已发布的数据（不管是通过适配器还是直接加载），将会导致数据被更改， 会发生。If either attempt to load the posted data, whether through the adapter or directly, results in the data being changed, a will occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有标记语言都支持使用完全数值用户输入。Not all markup languages support the use of fully numeric user input. 例如，HTML 不支持此属性。For example, HTML does not support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 星号是用于屏蔽密码的典型字符。An asterisk is a typical character that is used to mask a password. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 true，则在传输过程中不会加密或保护密码字符串。Setting the property to true does not encrypt or otherwise protect the password string during transmission.

summary.span: 文本框大小的默认值为 0，表示浏览器将使用其默认文本框长度。

span.span: The default value for the size of a text box is 0, which means that the browser will use its default text box length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此信息不用于对实际输入值执行验证检查。This information is not used to perform validation checks against the actual input value. 若要针对输入值执行验证检查，请使用验证程序控件或 属性。To perform a validation check against an input value, use the validator controls or the property. 此信息确定呈现行为。This information does determine the rendering behavior. 例如，此属性的值可帮助确定在 HTML 中生成输入文本框的大小。For example, the value of this property helps determine how large to make an input text box in HTML.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户更改 的文本时，不会立即引发此事件。When the user changes the text of a , this event is not raised immediately. 窗体必须包含用于启动引发 事件的回发事件的 。The form must contain a to initiate a postback event that raises the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来更改 中的项。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to change the items in a .
